lines.text: There's a hole in the wizard...
Maybe the statue came from that hole! Just... climbed right outta there!
I'm not going to say ''it wouldn't fit.''
I'm not going to say ''why would it be in there?''
I'm especially not going to say anything like ''statues can't move'', or ''why did it pick now to escape?''
Saying any of those things would be giving that idea way more credit than it deserves.
